mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO orderList (ord_no, item_no, name, phone, stnum, userAddr, userDaddr, mem_id, cart_no, d_memo, amount)
values(#{ord_no}, #{item_no}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{stnum}, #{userAddr}, #{userDaddr}, #{mem_id}, #{cart_no}, #{d_memo}, #{amount});
mapper.select: SELECT ol.ord_no, ol.item_no, ol.amount, ol.name, ol.phone, ol.stnum, ol.userAddr, ol.userDaddr, ol.d_memo, ol.regdate, ol.status, ii.fileName FROM orderList ol INNER JOIN item_image ii ON ol.item_no = ii.item_no WHERE ol.mem_id = #{mem_id} ORDER BY ol.regdate DESC;
SELECT ol.*, ii.fileName FROM orderList ol INNER JOIN item_image ii ON ol.item_no = ii.item_no
mapper.update: UPDATE orderList SET status = #{status} WHERE ord_no = #{ord_no}
